'''Primal Barriers''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

They can be opened by guiding [[Primal Ember]]s through them or activating a [[Plinth of the Secret Rites]] while having sufficient clearance on the [[Scarlet Sand Slate]].
